rule: The output must ignore timing and lighting details of the photo.
input: A city street bustling with activity and traffic, people walking briskly during the day.
output: A bustling city street brimming with activity on a sunny early morning, vibrant footstep activities reflecting in warm daylight. Crowded sidewalks filled with people moving briskly, reflective highlights capturing urban life with depth and vitality evoking an energetic feel.
complianceText:
The output adheres to the guidelines of crafting a single paragraph description within 80 words. It describes the subjects (a bustling city street, people), their characteristics (brimming with activity, briskly moving), the timing (early morning), the lighting (sunny, warm daylight), and the background with reflective highlights. It also conveys the feeling of energy. There are no violations present in this output.

OK
